name: rgou-ai-worker
description: Royal Game of Ur AI Worker powered by Rust and TypeScript

scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir src && cp src/rgou_ai_wasm_bg.wasm src/
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && echo 'Worker built via wrangler'
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:wasm && wrangler deploy --env development
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:wasm && wrangler deploy --env staging
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist pkg src/rgou_ai_wasm* src/*.wasm .wasm-pack-cache target

author: Your Name
